info.name: LAST.FM #01 ♔ Japanese flowers
info.description: Resolution: ALL HQ Screenshots: Profile page ; Artist page ; Tracks ; Library page Used this pattern/palette. Beautiful isn't it? ｡◕‿◕｡ http://dear-poop.tumblr.com
info.additionalInfo: This theme is likely a beta version. Means that i'm too lazy (and cause i'm working on it only since yesterday *cough*) to check every single part of Last.fm, so feel free to report any weird thing. ★ I will update when i'll find new stuff to change ★
